languages.text: Интерес Калькасара к Ефрату-II выглядит еще более загадочно в свете откровений техножрицы Аксиоманты. Лорд-капитан вправе потребовать от инквизитора ответов о том, что за страшное оружие покоилось в глубинах Ефрата-II, и как Калькасар планирует им распорядиться.

Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.

languages.text: L'intérêt qu'a manifesté Calcazar pour Euphrate-II semble d'autant plus étrange à la lumière des révélations de la technoprêtresse Axiomantha. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est parfaitement en droit de demander des explications au seigneur inquisiteur quant à la nature de l'arme redoutable enterrée dans les profondeurs d'Euphrate-II et ce qu'il compte en faire.
languages.original_text: Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.

traits.locale_text: L'intérêt qu'a manifesté Calcazar pour Euphrate-II semble d'autant plus étrange à la lumière des révélations de la technoprêtresse Axiomantha. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est parfaitement en droit de demander des explications au seigneur inquisiteur quant à la nature de l'arme redoutable enterrée dans les profondeurs d'Euphrate-II et ce qu'il compte en faire.

languages.text: 由于技术神甫阿修曼塔告知的真相，卡尔卡扎对欧夫拉茨二号星的目的看起来更加古怪了。埋藏在欧夫拉茨二号星深处的可怕武器究竟是做什么用的？卡尔卡扎究竟打算用它做什么？行商浪人完全有权利要求大审判官回答这些问题。
languages.original_text: Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.

traits.locale_text: 由于技术祭司阿修曼塔告知的真相，卡尔卡扎对欧夫拉茨二号星的目的看起来更加古怪了。埋藏在欧夫拉茨二号星深处的可怕武器究竟是做什么用的？卡尔卡扎究竟打算用它做什么？行商浪人完全有权利要求审判长回答这些问题。

languages.text: ユーフラテス・IIに対するカルカサルの興味は、技術司祭アクシオマンサが暴いた事実と照らし合わせると、さらに奇妙なものに思える。ユーフラテス・IIの地下深くに埋められた恐るべき武器の性質と、その使用にまつわるカルカサルの目的について、ロード・インクィジターに答えを求めるのは、ロード・キャプテンの当然の権利である。
languages.original_text: Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.

traits.locale_text: ユーフラテス・IIに対するカルカサルの興味は、技術司祭アクシオマンサが暴いた事実と照らし合わせると、さらに奇妙なものに思える。ユーフラテス・IIの地下深くに埋められた恐るべき武器の性質と、その使用にまつわるカルカサルの目的について、ロード・インクィジターに答えを求めるのは、ロード・キャプテンの当然の権利である。

languages.text: Calcazars Interesse an Eufrates II wirkt angesichts der Enthüllungen der Techpriesterin Axiomantha noch sonderbarer. Es ist das gute Recht des Lord Captains, Antworten vom Großinquisitor zu verlangen. Antworten zu der furchterregenden Waffe, die tief in Eufrates II vergraben war, und zu Calcazars Absichten, was deren Verwendung angeht.
languages.original_text: Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.

traits.locale_text: Calcazars Interesse an Eufrates II wirkt angesichts der Enthüllungen der Techpriesterin Axiomantha noch sonderbarer. Es ist das gute Recht des Lord Captains, Antworten vom Großinquisitor zu verlangen. Antworten zu der furchterregenden Waffe, die tief in Eufrates II vergraben war, und zu Calcazars Absichten, was deren Verwendung angeht.

languages.text: El interés de Calcazar por Eufrates II es más extraño aún a la luz de las revelaciones de Axiomantha. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán está plenamente en su derecho de exigir respuestas del Lord Inquisidor sobre la naturaleza de la temible arma que estaba enterrada en las profundidades de Eufrates II y sobre las intenciones que tiene Calcazar para ella.
languages.original_text: Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.

traits.locale_text: El interés de Calcazar por Eufrates II es más extraño aún a la luz de las revelaciones de Axiomantha. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán está plenamente en su derecho de exigir respuestas del Lord Inquisidor sobre la naturaleza de la temible arma que estaba enterrada en las profundidades de Eufrates II y sobre las intenciones que tiene Calcazar para ella.

languages.text: Tekno Rahip Axiomantha'nın anlattıklarına rağmen Calcazar'ın Eufrates II'ye karşı duyduğu ilgi, hâlâ tuhaflığını koruyor. Eufrates II'nin derinlerinde gömülü olan korkunç silahın doğası ve Calcazar'ın onu kullanma niyetlerine dair sorularına cevap aramak üzere Lord Engizisyoncu ile konuşmak, Lord Kaptan'ın hakkı.
languages.original_text: Calcazar's interest in Eufrates II now seems stranger still in light of the Tech-Priest Axiomantha's revelations. The Lord Captain is well within {mf|his|her} rights to demand answers from the Lord Inquisitor about the nature of the fearsome weapon that was buried in the depths of Eufrates II and about Calcazar's intentions regarding its use.
